description:
Epic Evocations: how to make simple spell effect markers for D&D and Warhammer
➢Incredible Incantations: https://youtu.be/dOftIzUnueQ
➢All Custom Miniatures: https://tinyurl.com/y22ck2cv 
➢All my Terrain for D&D: https://tinyurl.com/yyco9kkr 
          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
On my website, you can find templates for some of the builds, recommended products, and The Hall of Glorious Crafts where exceptionally epic fan-made projects are showcased.
➢Website: https://bardscraft.wixsite.com/craft
➢Support the Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢Patreon Alternative: All Patreon rewards are also available through monthly PayPal subscriptions. More info on my website. https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=XSBDFANJXHREA&source=url
➢Bard's Craft Nerd Chat: https://discord.gg/n5AfW36

➢Start playing Dungeons & Dragons by getting the Core Rulebooks:

I'm set up as an Amazon Affiliate in some regions. Especially to make it easier for new crafters I have linked to products I use and recommend. Any purchases through affiliate links grant me a small commission which is a good way to support the channel at no extra cost. More recommended products on my website.
